Name: Armored Blow 1
Desc: Grants Def+2 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Armored Blow 2
Desc: Grants Def+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Armored Blow 3
Desc: Grants Def+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Attack +1
Desc: Grants Atk+1.

Name: Attack +2
Desc: Grants Atk+2.

Name: Attack +3
Desc: Grants Atk+3.

Name: Attack Def +1
Desc: Grants Atk/Def+1.

Name: Attack Def +2
Desc: Grants Atk/Def+2.

Name: Close Counter
Desc: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Name: Darting Blow 1
Desc: Grants Spd+2 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Darting Blow 2
Desc: Grants Spd+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Darting Blow 3
Desc: Grants Spd+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Death Blow 1
Desc: Grants Atk+2 if unit initiates combat.

Name: Death Blow 2
Desc: Grants Atk+4 if unit initiates combat.

Name: Death Blow 3
Desc: Grants Atk+6 if unit initiates combat.

Name: Defense +1
Desc: Grants Def+1.

Name: Defense +2
Desc: Grants Def+2.

Name: Defense +3
Desc: Grants Def+3.

Name: Defiant Atk 1
Desc: Grants Atk +3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Atk 2
Desc: Grants Atk +5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Atk 3
Desc: Grants Atk +7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%

Name: Defiant Def 1
Desc: Grants Def+3 at start of turn if unit's HP < 50%

Name: Defiant Def 2
Desc: Grants Def+5 at start of turn if unit's HP < 50%

Name: Defiant Def 3
Desc: Grants Def+7 at start of turn if unit's HP < 50%

Name: Defiant Res 1
Desc: Grants Res+3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Name: Defiant Res 2
Desc: Grants Res+5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Name: Defiant Res 3
Desc: Grants Res+7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Name: Defiant Spd 1
Desc: Grants Spd+3 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Name: Defiant Spd 2
Desc: Grants Spd+5 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Name: Defiant Spd 3
Desc: Grants Spd+7 at start of turn if unit's HP ≤ 50%.

Name: Distant Counter
Desc: Enables unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

Name: Fortress Def 1
Desc: Grants Def+3. Inflicts Atk-3.

Name: Fortress Def 2
Desc: Grants Def+4. Inflicts Atk-3.

Name: Fortress Def 3
Desc: Grants Def+5. Inflicts Atk-3.

Name: Fury 1
Desc: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+1. Unit takes 2 damage after combat.

Name: Fury 2
Desc: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. Unit takes 4 damage after combat.

Name: Fury 3
Desc: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. Unit takes 6 damage after combat.

Name: Heavy Blade 1
Desc: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 5, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 attack.

Name: Heavy Blade 2
Desc: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 3, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 attack.

Name: Heavy Blade 3
Desc: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 attack.

Name: HP +3
Desc: Grants +3 to max HP.

Name: HP +4
Desc: Grants +4 to max HP.

Name: HP +5
Desc: Grants +5 to max HP.

Name: Iote's Shield
Desc: Neutralizes "effective against" bonuses.

Name: Life and Death 1
Desc: Grants Atk/Spd+3. Inflicts Def/Res-3.

Name: Life and Death 2
Desc: Grants Atk/Spd+4. Inflicts Def/Res-4.

Name: Life and Death 3
Desc: Grants Atk/Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5.

Name: Resistance +1
Desc: Grants Res+1

Name: Resistance +2
Desc: Grants Res+2

Name: Resistance +3
Desc: Grants Res+3

Name: Speed +1
Desc: Grants Spd+1

Name: Speed +2
Desc: Grants Spd+2

Name: Speed +3
Desc: Grants Spd+3

Name: Svalinn Shield
Desc: Neutralizes "effective against" bonuses.

Name: Swift Sparrow 1
Desc: If unit initiates combat, unit granted Atk/Spd+2 during battle.

Name: Swift Sparrow 2
Desc: If unit initiates combat, unit granted Atk/Spd+4 during battle.

Name: Triangle Adept 1
Desc: Gives Atk+10% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-10% if disadvantage.

Name: Triangle Adept 2
Desc: Gives Atk+15% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-15% if disadvantage.

Name: Triangle Adept 3
Desc: Gives Atk+20% if weapon-triangle advantage, Atk-20% if disadvantage.

Name: Warding Blow 1
Desc: Grants Res+2 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Warding Blow 2
Desc: Grants Res+4 during combat if unit initiates the attack.

Name: Warding Blow 3
Desc: Grants Res+6 during combat if unit initiates the attack.
